summary: A railroad man and the owner of a freight line battle for control of a crucial mountain pass.
cast: Richard Dix|Jane Wyatt|Albert Dekker|Lee J. Cobb|Victor Jory|Lola Lane|Max Baer|Joe Sawyer|Harry Allen|Francis McDonald|George Reeves|Bill Nestell|Silver Tip Baker|Ralph Bucko|Roy Bucko|Bob Card|Tex Cooper|Art Dillard|Clem Fuller|Herman Hack|Al Haskell|Earle Hodgins|Paul Kruger|Merrill McCormick|George Morrell|Tex Phelps|Rose Plumer|Scott Seaton|Jack Tornek|Blackie Whiteford
title: Buckskin Frontier
